item.description: Hello and welcome to my world ðŸŒŽ I’m a Software Engineering Manager passionate about building loveable, reliable, and intuitive products. I like talking about programming, developer workflow, and software design principles. I am motivated to help people and teams grow as they solve real-world technological challenges. I’ve been building low latency, real time trading applications for the past 8+ years. All food everything excites me. I aim to eat at every 3 Michelin Star restaurants in the world.
